climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: FOOD LEVEL STAINLESS STEEL: The heavy duty Hotec kitchen tongs built with stainless steel, sturdy, heat resistance, anti-rust, anti-corrosion, light weight, easy to handle, like new forever. This tongs for cooking comes with a set of 2, standard 9" cooking tongs and large sized 12" BBQ grill tongs. Food safe, Carbonfree Certified.

PULL RING LOCK AND UNLOCK AND HANGING LOOP: This kitchen tongs set has locking mechanism, pull the ring for lock and push for unlock, super easy operation. Hang them with the hanging loop after use or put in the drawer by pulling the ring to lock it, space saving.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE DESIGN AND HEAT RESISTANT: The handle is cushioned with silicon, good for thumb rest and ensures good grip and control. The metal tong head is super heat resistant. Easy to rinse, dishwasher safe.

ENGINEERING FOR SAFETY: New design pattern for the handle, better protects your hands from cutting by the edge when you grip the handle. Easy to control the handle and to eliminate wobbling & any risk of burning your hands

MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS: Basic kitchen utensil, perfect for indoor or outdoor use, great for daily kitchen tasks, grilling corn, flipping burgers/fish, cutting roast meat, or used as BBQ turner or salad server and much more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This restaurant quality kitchen tongs set comes with a 9” standard tong for food serving and a 12” large tong for grill or BBQ. Function Use these cooking tongs to turn hot food or cold food with ease while keeping your hands away from oil splatter and fire. 12" is great for grilling and 9" is perfect for kitchen task. Material These kitchen tongs are made of food level stainless steel, durable and like new forever. The handle is cushioned with silicon to ensure good grip. Design The locking mechanism is super user friendly, pull for lock and push for unlock. The spring that keeps the kitchen tongs open is super heavy duty and will open and close many times. A thumb rest allows your thumb to be in the perfect position to help guide the cooking tongs where they need to go. The tongs also come with a hanging loop, simply hang them with the hanging loop after use or put in the drawer when lock closed to save space. Packing content 9” standard kitchen tong x 1 12” large kitchen tong x 1
HOTEC Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent features and a very good price.
reviews.reviewText: Works very well. Easy to handle food without damage. The size in just right for removing food from pans, etc. Like the locking feature. This replaced a tong that had a lock in the middle of the handle that broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Metal and grippy
reviews.reviewText: I bought these tongs because I needed metal ones that wouldn’t melt while cooking various meats. These tongs are sturdy and very useful. I haven’t had any issues with them and they have a rubber grip on the sides as well. Easy to clean, easy to use. No complaints from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are exactly what you're looking for.
reviews.reviewText: These 3 sizes are perfect and they seem really well made and sturdy! I like the silicone pads on the handles to have somewhere to rest your hand if the metal heats up and I like that the locking mechanism is easy to grab and also silicone. If you're looking for sturdy, useful cooking/serving tongs, you can't really go wrong with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality of the metal
reviews.reviewText: Quality is not as good as the previous one I had. Metal is thinner, but the price was fair. Hopefully they will last awhile as I use them quite frequently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Stainless Steel Tongs
reviews.reviewText: All three work well and come out clean using dishwasher. No rust spots from cheap steel. The open/close mechanism seems to be solid. Only had them a week but used them for grilling steaks and serving a salad. The three tong set is nice but having one of the longer tongs, over 12 inches, would be useful when turning items over hot grill, but for indoor cooking they seem like a good set. Happy with this purchase : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No floppy rings to fall and lock tongs! :)
reviews.reviewText: So far these work well and are sturdy. The locking mechanism is stress free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed! 2 Pairs of tongs, different sizes, that does what it's supposed to do. Easy to use and clean. Lightweight and durable. Great price! Came back to purchase 2 more sets for my mother and sister.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and value!
reviews.reviewText: Top notch stuff. Equal to expensive stuff!
Ces pinces sont de très bonne qualité. Elles fonctionnent très bien.N’hésitez pas à en acheter.

The paddles are not attached to the tongs. It's all one piece. So, those other tongs that have a plastic paddle that is clipped to the arm, they tend to fall off over time. This, this is the professional tongs. They fabricate the whole arm from the top to the paddle, a single piece.Professional kitchens use this style of tongs.Invest, it's inexpensive and I pretty much know I won't be buying replacement tongs in my lifetime.7" and 9" tongs. I think I might buy a second set. The other product with a set of three comes with an additional 12" tongs. Those are too long for anything I would do, but if you have a large wok, maybe then the 12" might be useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great, fit in hand perfectly easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Firm Grip & Sturdy in the hand.. great value
reviews.reviewText: Got these Hotec Stainless Steel Tongs, I'm super impressed! The 9" and 12" set is perfect for all my cooking needs. The metal tongs have a non-slip grip that holds food securely, and the locking mechanism is so handy. Highly recommend for hassle-free flipping and serving!"
